rows.label: tlk70000121_01_msg0001
rows.name:
Heheh... Now I'll use this to
startle those soldiers at the
dock and knock them flat...

rows.label: tlk70000121_01_msg0002
rows.name: Huh?! How long have you been there?

rows.label: tlk70000121_01_msg0003
rows.name:
Oh! You want to know exactly how
to knock your enemies flat?

rows.label: tlk70000121_01_msg0004
rows.name:
It's easy, just startle them with a
fireburster, then swipe their legs
from under them. Works a charm!

rows.label: tlk70000121_01_msg0005
rows.name:
Eh? You don't have a fireburster?
Well, I don't know then, use an
Art or ether power or something.

rows.label: tlk70000121_01_msg0006
rows.name:
Anyway, just startle the enemy and
throw them off balance, then knock
them over. That's all you need to do!
